metadata.title: CVE-2020-35980 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and 1.0.1. There is ause-after-free in the function gf_isom_box_del() in isomedia/box_funcs.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
